description:
The Silver Saints Dante and Capella outclass Shun and Hyoga, throwing them off the cliff. But as they turn to Saori, Ikki suddenly appears.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: A fronteira entre a vida e a morte
Specter! The Line Between Life and Death
¡Ilusión Diabólica! La frontera entre la vida y la muerte
À la frontière de la mort
幻魔! 生死のデッドライン
